publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2064 Hugh O’Donnell: Chief Executive of the General Teaching Council for Scotland—That the Parliament congratulates the new Chief Executive of the General Teaching Council for Scotland, Mr Anthony Finn, on his appointment; recognises the substantial contribution to education and teaching in Scotland made by the retiring Chief Executive, Matthew MacIver CBE, who is retiring in September, and welcomes the continuity of expertise that will be sustained as a result of this appointment.
S3M-2064 Chief Executive of the General Teaching Council for Scotland (lodged on 4 June 2008) Hugh Henry*, Bob Doris*, Jim Tolson*, Mike Pringle*, Bill Kidd*, Bashir Ahmad*, Jim Hume*, Jamie Hepburn*

S3M-2064 Hugh O’Donnell: Chief Executive of the General Teaching Council for Scotland—That the Parliament congratulates the new Chief Executive of the General Teaching Council for Scotland, Mr Anthony Finn, on his appointment; recognises the substantial contribution to education and teaching in Scotland made by the retiring Chief Executive, Matthew MacIver CBE, who is retiring in September, and welcomes the continuity of expertise that will be sustained as a result of this appointment. Supported by: Hugh Henry, Bob Doris, Jim Tolson, Mike Pringle, Bill Kidd, Bashir Ahmad, Jim Hume, Jamie Hepburn, Elaine Smith* R, Marlyn Glen*, Robin Harper*
S3M-2064 Chief Executive of the General Teaching Council for Scotland (lodged on 4 June 2008) Stuart McMillan*
S3M-2064 Chief Executive of the General Teaching Council for Scotland (lodged on 4 June 2008) Jack McConnell*
S3M-2064 Chief Executive of the General Teaching Council for Scotland (lodged on 4 June 2008) Rhona Brankin*
S3M-2064 Chief Executive of the General Teaching Council for Scotland (lodged on 4 June 2008) Ken Macintosh*
